GameActivity - Class in com.example.inversekinematics.activities
Main game loop activity, handles user input Will end after a set period of time and display the GameOverPopUp

Reference to the game engine
GameEngine - Class in com.example.inversekinematics.engine
Main class for managing the game Updates the game state and handles player and enemy movement and food spawning
